derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via late Latin from Greek monas, monad- 'unit', from monos 'alone'

means.word_mean: 1. an atom having a valence of one
2. a singular metaphysical entity from which material properties are said to derive

auth_sentence.content: Unity, or a non-articulated monad, is unspeakable and unthinkable.
